conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Hello, welcome. How are you feeling today?

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I've been pretty anxious this week.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Thanks for sharing. What situations triggered the anxiety?

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: Mostly work meetings and tight deadlines.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: What helped you cope when it felt overwhelming?

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: Taking short walks and deep breathing helped a bit.
